name: Charly RM
description: Charly RM is a passionate web developer with experience in building digital solutions that combine functionality and design. He specializes in creating modern, responsive web applications using technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like React and Node.js. He is always eager to learn new tools and improve his skills to deliver innovative and high-quality projects. His goal is to create seamless user experiences while embracing the latest industry trends.
